from application

select
from application where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

insert into application (gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, is_deleted, name, user_id, type) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
